Package edu.rpi.legup.ui.proofeditorui.treeview

Class TreeNodeView

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.ui.proofeditorui.treeview.TreeElementView
edu.rpi.legup.ui.proofeditorui.treeview.TreeNodeView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
public class TreeNodeView extends TreeElementView
Represents a view of a tree node in the tree structure. This class extends TreeElementView and provides specific rendering and interaction functionality for tree nodes. It includes visual properties and methods to manage the node's appearance, location, and its relationships with other nodes.

    • getPathIterator

      public PathIterator getPathIterator(AffineTransform at)
      Returns an iterator over the path geometry of this TreeNodeView. The iterator provides access to the path's segments and their coordinates, which can be used for rendering or hit testing.
      Parameters:
      at - the AffineTransform to apply to the path geometry
      Returns:
      a PathIterator that iterates over the path geometry of this TreeNodeView

    • getPathIterator

      public PathIterator getPathIterator(AffineTransform at, double flatness)
      Returns an iterator over the path geometry of this TreeNodeView with the specified flatness. The iterator provides access to the path's segments and their coordinates, which can be used for rendering or hit testing.
      Parameters:
      at - the AffineTransform to apply to the path geometry
      flatness - the maximum distance that the line segments can deviate from the true path
      Returns:
      a PathIterator that iterates over the path geometry of this TreeNodeView
